message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $1800000?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $1900000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll meet you halfway from your counteroffer, so I'll offer $1850000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'm willing to compromise to reach a deal. What do you think?

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence in finding a mutually beneficial price. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1900000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counter with $1875000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you halfway from your latest offer, so I'll offer $1875000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'm willing to compromise to reach a deal. What do you think?
